BH/KILLERBOT/TAKEDOWN/BLASTRAGE

THe ship slowly lands as the 4 bots come out
BH:"I want the perimeter autoguns up, Killerbot. I want the auto guns 
around the base put up LT. Takedown. And for you general Blastrage I 
want sheilds up and quick area map printed out"
The three other bots:"yes sir"
THE bots get to work
